experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: - Led a team in developing a Golang-based backend service using Mux router for microservice management and Postgres database with Ent.go as ORM.- Implemented HTTP layered architecture patterns and rigorous testing standards to ensure scalability and reliability.- Utilized Docker containers with Postgres and Supertokens auth for automated deployment.- Integrated the Go Ethereum package to establish communication with smart contracts using interfaces.
